wlsRedcapApp 0.1.0

Package index

Functions

Set of functions underlying the Shiny app

add_standardized_scores()
Add Standardized Scores to Data from REDCap
demographics_table()
Summary Table with Demographic Information
functional_measures_table()
Summary Table with Functional Measures
main_table()
Create NACC T-Cog Neuropsychological Assessment Summary Table
plot_cog_var()
Function to Plot Cognitive Variables over Time
prep_data()
Prepare data from REDCap
standardized_cog_digsym()
Get standardized WAIS-R Digit Symbol score
standardized_cog_flc_flu()
Get standardized F+L+C Words score
standardized_cog_ravlt_recog_acc()
Get standardized RAVLT Recognition Accuracy score
var_labels()
Create Row Labels for Main Table

Shiny App and Modules

These functions are the foundation of the Shiny app

dataPrepApp()
Shiny App wrapping the data prep module
plotCogVarApp()
Shiny App Wrapping the variable plotting module
wlsRedcapApp()
Start Shiny App
dataPrepUI() dataPrepServer()
Shiny Module for Preparing Data from the WLS REDCap Project
mainTableUI() mainTableServer()
Shiny Module to Display NACC T-Cog Neuropsychological Assessment Summary Table
plotCogVarUI() plotCogVarServer()
Shiny Module to Plot Scores Across Visits

Data

The data included in this package

cowat_ranges
COWAT ranges
demo_data
Demo Data Set
dig_symb_ranges
WAIS-R Digit Symbols ranges
male_female
Various Cognition Measures: means and standard deviations
otmt
Oral Trail Making Test: means and standard deviations
ravlt_recog_ranges
RAVLT Recognition ranges
ravlt_trials_m_sd
RAVLT Means and SDs
